Animal Friendship.Short Description: Gain Edge on Will rolls against animals.
Animal Friendship.Description: Gain Edge on Will rolls against creatures with a -4 Aptitude bonus. If the caster succeeds on a Will roll the creature is also Charmed by the caster.

Arcane Armor.Description: The caster's Deflect becomes 4 and add +2 to the caster's Soak. This armor does not impose Hindrance on Enigma rolls. When cast at a higher Tier, add a +1 to Deflect and +1 to Soak for every Tier it is cast at beyond 1st.

Acrane Orb.Description: Deal 2D10 to the target. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 2d10 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Arcane Shield.Short Description: Gain an Edge on Deflect and React defenses.
Arcane Shield.Description: Gain an Edge on Deflect and React defenses.

Arcane Step.Short Description: Teleport up to 12 spaces into an unoccupied space.
Arcane Step.Description: Teleport up to 12 spaces into an unoccupied space the caster has Line of Effect. When cast at a higher Tier, take an additional adjacent creature for every Tier beyond 1st.

Bane.Short Description: Attackers have Edge against all the target's defenses, and Edge on defenses against attacks from target.
Bane.Description: Attackers have Edge against all the target's defenses, and Edge on defenses against attacks from target.

Blessing.Short Description: Creature gains a D4 to all Rolls.
Blessing.Description: Creature gains a 1d4 to all d12 rolls. When cast at a higher Tier, target an additional creature for every Tier beyond 1st.

Blur.Short Description: Gain an Edge on Deflect rolls.
Blur.Description: Gain an Edge on Deflect rolls. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional target for every Tier beyond 1st.

Bolster.Short Description: Grant the target 1d10+Spellcasting Bonus Temporary HP. Ends the Bleeding condition.
Bolster.Description: Grant the target 1d10+Spellcasting Bonus Temporary HP. Ends the Bleeding condition. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d8 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Bond of Ward.Short Description: Target creature gains Edge on defenses and Damage Resistance. When the target loses HP the caster loses the same amount of HP.
Bond of Ward.Description: Target creature gains Edge on defenses and Damage Resistance. The caster can cast spells with the Self or Touch target on the Target creature regardless of how far apart they are. When the target loses HP the caster loses the same amount of HP. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional creature for every Tier it is cast at beyond 1st.

Bonfire.Description: Creatures within the bonfire or that move through it that fail their React take 1d6 damage. As a Perk they gain the Burning condition. As a Maneuver the caster can move the bonfire 6 spaces. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.
Bonfire.Short Description: Deal D6 damage to creatures within or move through.

Change Size.Short Description: Target is made small or large sized
Change Size.Description: Target is made small or large sized, their gear changes size along with them. When cast at a higher Tier, target an additional creature for every Tier beyond 1st.

Charming.Short Description: Edge on social rolls and makes Charmed
Charming.Description: Gain an Edge on all Social rolls. On a successful roll the target is Charmed by the caster.

Command.Short Description: Target becomes Charmed and must attempt two word command.
Command.Description: The caster can speak a two word command to the target becomes Charmed and must attempt it. They cannot attempt to kill themselves.

Comprehend Languages.Short Description: Understand any language the caster hear or read.
Comprehend Languages.Description: Understand any language the caster hear or read. The caster cannot speak the language or write it.

Conjure Flame.Short Description: A torch sized flame appears in the casters hand that can be used it to light fires.
Conjure Flame.Description: A torch sized flame appears in the casters hand that can be used it to light fires. As a Maneuver the caster can fling a flame up to 6 spaces by rolling Spellcasting Roll against the target's Deflect that deals 1d6 damage. As a Perk the target gains the Burning condition. Flinging the flame does not end the spell. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Maneuver.Title: Fling Conjured Flame
Maneuver.Description: Flinging the flame does not end the spell.

Corpse Grasp.Description: Deal 1d10 damage to the target. As a Perk the target is Blighted. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Cure Wounds.Short Description: Heal the 1d8+Spellcasting Bonus worth of HP.
Cure Wounds.Description: Heal the 1d8+Spellcasting Bonus worth of HP. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d8 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Dancing Light.Short Description: Torch sized light within Range that hover within range
Dancing Light.Description: Summon a torch sized light within Range that hover in the air for the duration that moves in relationship to the caster. The caster can move the light up to 12 spaces within the Range as a Maneuver. Conjure an additional light by one for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Dawning Light.Short Description: Glow with Daylight and grant Edge against Undead and Daylight sensitive creatures.
Dawning Light.Description: The caster glows with true daylight. Allies have an Edge on all rolls against undead or Daylight sensitive creatures. Dispels magical Darkness if affecting target area.

Detect Magic.Description: See ongoing spells, know what spell is being cast by a creature, or see the remnants of spells that were cast within 1 hour for every Tier the caster is.

Divine Armament.Short Description: Flying weapon deals D6. Move it as a Maneuver
Divine Armament.Description: Conjure flying weapon that deals 1d6 damage that can be directed to move up to 12 spaces and attack as a Maneuver. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d6 for each tier beyond 1st.

Divine Interpose.Short Description: Target adds 1d4 to Soak every time they take damage
Divine Interpose.Description: Target adds 1d4 to Soak every time they take damage. Creature can only have this spell cast on them once at a time. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional creature for every Tier beyond 1st. If cast as a Ritual the duration becomes 1 day.

Divine Investure.Short Description: The caster's weapon bursts with divine energy and deals an additional 1d8 damage
Divine Investure.Description: The caster's weapon bursts with divine energy and deals an additional 1d8 damage. The caster can make a Wits+Weapons roll against a target's React defense within 12 spaces dealing 1d8 damage a target. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d8 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Enhance.Short Description: Target has Edge on chosen Stat
Enhance.Description: Target has Edge on rolls with one Stat chosen when the spell is cast. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional creature for every Tier beyond 1st.

Entangle.Short Description: Makes area Difficult Terrain and targets in area Restrained.
Entangle.Description: On a success the target is Restrained until the spells end. Each round the caster re-rolls the attack against targets' Body. Even if a creature frees themselves or moves into the target area it is Difficult Terrain. If cast as a Ritual the Duration becomes 1 day and doesn't require Concentration.

Farspeech.Description: The caster can send a short message 25 words long to a target on the same plane. The target can respond with a 25 word message of their own. When cast at a higher Tier, add 10 words to the message for every Tier beyond 1st.

Feather Fall.Description: Target takes no fall damage. When cast at a higher Tier, the spell can target an additional creature for every Tier beyond 1st.

Fireburst.Description: Deal 3d6 damage to creatures within the target area. As a Perk targets gain the Burning condition. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 2d6 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Flameblade.Description: Summon a flaming weapon that deals 2d6 damage and has the Bladed, Finesse, and Simple Tags. Attacks give the Burning condition. It can be used to start fires. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d6 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Flare.Description: Target is Blinded for 1d6 rounds. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional target for every Tier beyond 1st.

Fog.Description: Creatures within the fog have Cover. When cast at a higher Tier, increase the radius of the Sphere by one space for every Tier beyond 1st.

Fortify Spirit.Short Description: Allies within the Aura have Edge on Mind rolls and are immune to being Frightened.
Fortify Spirit.Description: Allied creatures within the Aura have Edge on Mind defense rolls and are immune to being Frightened.

Foxfire.Short Description: Targets glow with Low Light, revealing invisible creatures. Gain Edge against target's Deflect
Foxfire.Description: Targets glow with Low Light, revealing invisible creatures. Rolls against the target's Deflect defense have Edge. When cast at a higher Tier, increase the radius of the Sphere by one space for every Tier beyond 1st.

Goodberry.Description: Enchant Will+Enigma berries. Each berry heals 1 HP and provides nourishment for 1 day. The berries rot after 1 hour.

Grease.Short Description: The area becomes Difficult Terrain. Targets that fail React fall Prone
Grease.Description: Targets within the area are covered in grease, those that fail their defense fall prone. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. The grease is flammable, deals 1d6 damage to all creatures within area and ends the spell. When cast at a higher Tier, the damage from igniting the grease increases by 1d6 for every Tier beyond 1st.

Gust of Wind.Description: Targets that fail their defense are knocked prone. Gasses, mists, and toxic air is dispersed or pushed.

Heal.Short Description: Heal one level of Blighted and remove a condition
Heal.Description: The target is healed one level of Blighted and one of the following conditions: Blinded, Bleeding, Deafened, Paralyzed, Petrified, Sickened, or Unconscious. When cast at a higher Tier, heal an additional condition for for every Tier beyond 1st.

Hypnotic Pattern.Description: Targets are incapacitated and charmed by the caster. If the target takes damage the target is released from the spell. When cast at a higher Tier, increase the radius of the spell by 1 space for every Tier over 2nd.

Leap.Short Description: Target can leap their movement speed in any direction.
Leap.Description: As a Maneuver Target can leap their movement speed in any direction. It has to be taken in one movement. When cast at a higher Tier, add two additional creatures for every Tier beyond 1st.

Levitate.Short Description: Hover speed equal to their Stride speed.
Levitate.Description: The caster gains a Hover speed equal to their Stride speed. When cast at a higher Tier, target an additional creature for each Tier beyond 1st.

Light.Description: The target item sheds light as if it were a torch. Enchant an additional item for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Lightning Bolt.Description: Deal 2d6 damage to creatures within target area. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 2d6 for each Tier beyond 1st.

Locate Object.Description: Learn the direction to an object, the distance to an object, and a snapshot of the area around the object from its perspective. If the caster has had the object in their possession, it is a Simple roll, if they have seen the object it is an Easy roll, if they have seen a drawing it is a Hard roll, and if they have only heard a description it is a Desperate roll. When cast at a higher Tier, multiply the Target by 10 for each Tier beyond 1st.

Mage Grounding.Short Description: Target takes 2d8 damage. During each of the caster turns they can continue the spell with a Maneuver.
Mage Grounding.Description: Target takes 2d8 damage. During each of the caster turns they can continue the spell with a Maneuver. Subsequent rounds automatically hit. On the target's next round they have a Hindrance on all rolls. If the target leaves the range or gains Full Cover the spell ends. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d8 for each Tier beyond 1st.

Mage Hand.Short Description: Lift or manipulate an item less than 5lbs or deal 1d4 damage
Mage Hand.Description: Manifests a translucent hand can lift or manipulate an item less than 5lbs or deal 1d4 damage to a target. The weight it can manipulate increases by 5lbs and the damage it does increases by 1d4 for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Masquerade.Short Description: Disguise the target. Target gains Edge on rolls against disguise
Masquerade.Description: Change the target's form to appear as a humanoid wearing whatever clothes the caster chooses. If the target is masquerading as another creature they have Edge on rolls against their disguise. When cast at a higher Tier, an additional two creatures can be transformed for each Tier beyond 1st.

Message.Description: Inaudibly send a short message to a creature within Range. The targets can reply to the caster with an inaudible short message of their own. The targets increase by one for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Mold Earth.Perk: Creature in the target area is Exposed
Mold Earth.Short Description: Move earth within the target area
Mold Earth.Description: Move an area of earth that fits within the target area, excavating, building up, and shaping it. It does not move fast enough to bury someone or cause fall damage if excavated below a creature. As a Perk a creature in the target area is Exposed The area targeted increases by another 1 space Cube for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Moonbeam.Description: A beam shines down dealing 3d6 damage. Half as much on a successful defense. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 2d6 for each tier beyond 1st.

Prestidigitation.Short Description: Dry, moisten, clean, snuff candles, light candles, or create a strong breeze
Prestidigitation.Description: The caster can dry, moisten, clean, snuff candles, light candles, or create a strong breeze in the area. The Cube area increases by 1 for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Primal Strike.Description: The target takes 1d8 damage. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Purifying Flame.Perk: Target is Blinded until the end of their next Turn.
Purifying Flame.Description: The target takes 1d8 damage. As a Perk the target is Blinded until the end of their next Turn. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Shape Flesh.Short Description: Gain new Swim, Fly, Soak, or D6 natural weapon
Shape Flesh.Description: Change the caster's form to give them one new capability. They can adapt to an aquatic environment with a 6 space Swim speed, grow functional wings with a 6 space Fly speed, grow armor plates that increase their Soak by 2, or gain a natural weapon that deals 1d6 damage per character Tier. When cast at a higher Tier, the caster can add an additional capability for every Tier beyond 1st.

Shield of Faith.Short Description: Target has an Edge on their defenses.
Shield of Faith.Description: Target has an Edge on their defenses.

Silence.Short Description: No silence is heard within the area nor do any leave the area.
Silence.Description: No silence is heard within the area nor do any leave the area. When cast at a higher Tier, increase the radius of the Sphere by 1 space for every Tier beyond 1st.

Snuff Light.Description: The area is plunged into magical darkness blocking all light sources within it, including those from magical sources.

Speak with Animals.Short Description: Speak with beasts and they are Charmed.
Speak with Animals.Description: Speak with animals as if they have an Aptitude of - 1 and are Charmed by the caster. If the spell is cast as a Ritual the duration becomes 1 hour.

Spike Field.Description: Area becomes Hazardous Terrain that deals 1d6 damage. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional die for each tier beyond 1st.

Teleportation Anchor.Description: Create a unique teleportation circle that makes teleportation to the circle easier. When cast at a higher Tier, increase the radius of the Circle by 1 space for every Tier beyond 1st. If cast as a Ritual the anchor becomes Permanent.

Thorn Whip.Short Description: Deals 1d6 damage, the target is pulled up to 3 spaces closer to the caster.
Thorn Whip.Description: Conjure a whip that has a 3 space Reach that deals 1d6 damage and the target is pulled up to 3 spaces closer to the caster. As a Perk the target is Exposed. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Thunderblast.Description: Targets take 1d10 damage, are pushed 3 spaces. As a Perk targets are knocked Prone. Add an additional die for each tier beyond 1st it is cast at.

Thunderstrike.Perk: Target is Deafened until end of next turn
Thunderstrike.Description: Target takes 1d8 damage and is pushed 1 space. As a Perk the target is Deafened until the end of their next turn. Increase the die and the spaces pushed by 1 for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Tremor.Short Description: Targets fall prone and take 1d6 damage.
Tremor.Description: Targets fall prone and take 1d6 damage. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 1d6 for each tier beyond 1st.

Unerring Bolt.Short Description: Three bolts of energy, each deals D4 damage
Unerring Bolt.Description: Fire three separate bolts of energy, each deals 1d4 damage as separate attacks and automatically hits. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional two bolts of energy for each Tier beyond 1st.

Whipser of Life.Short Description: Target dying creature stabilizes, reset's death saves, and grants 1d6 Temporary HP.
Whipser of Life.Description: Target dying creature stabilizes, reset's death saves, and grants 1d6 Temporary HP. As a Perk the target is no longer Unconscious. Target another creature for every tier the caster is beyond 1st.

Winter's Blast.Description: Deal 3d6 to creatures within the target area. When cast at a higher Tier, add an additional 2d6 for each tier beyond 1st at.

Wounding Chant.Perk: As a Perk they gain the Bleeding condition.
Wounding Chant.Short Description: Target takes 1d6 damage. If they are already wounded the target takes 1d10 instead.
Wounding Chant.Description: Target takes 1d6 damage. If they are already wounded the target takes 1d10 instead. As a Perk they gain the Bleeding condition. Increase the die for every Tier the caster is beyond 1st.
